channel.title: Quests and portals.. pls try to help!
channel.description:
Please can someone tell me how to make all the quests complete when someone starts my server as having to do quests is annoying!
And how i go about adding a portal and linking it to various co-ords.
Thankyou, Jake :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 05:36:59 pm[/size][hr]Also how do i add items to the shops??
